description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of rooms in a mobile app, including functionality to fetch room data from an API, handle loading and error states, and display the data in a list.

classes.name: RoomsListScreen
classes.description: A public Flutter widget that displays a list of available rooms, with fetching data from an API and handling different UI states.

classes.name: _RoomsListScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the stateful behavior of `RoomsListScreen`, including data fetching, error handling, and UI rendering.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers the initial load of room data.

methods.name: _loadRooms
methods.description: Asynchronous method to fetch room data from the API and update UI state accordingly.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the rooms list screen, handling loading, error, empty, and data display states.
